content:
IconEffect Enum

Definition

Specifies the visual effect that the visual style will apply to an icon.

In this Article

public enum IconEffect
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
IconEffect

Remarks

The IconEffect values represent the return values of the GetEnumValue method when it is called with an argument value of System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty.

Fields

Alpha

The icon is alpha-blended.
Glow

The icon glows.
None

No visual effect is applied to the icon.
Pulse

The icon pulses.
Shadow

The icon has a shadow.
